nodes.name: Utterly Selective Grape
nodes.description:
'There,' said he; 'now you have a heart that any man might be proud of. I'm sorry I had to put a patch on your breast, but it really couldn't be helped.' 'Never mind the patch,' exclaimed the happy Woodman. 'I am very grateful to you, and shall never forget your kindness.' 'Don't speak of it,' replied Oz. Then the Tin Woodman went back to his friends, who wished him every joy on account of his good fortune. The Lion now walked to the Throne Room and knocked at the door. 'Come in,' said Oz. 'I have come for my courage,' announced the Lion, entering the room. 'Very well,' answered the little man; 'I will get it for you.'

Image Source: www.flickr.com/photo.gne?id=42020358390
